This classic film, set in the tumultuous times leading up to the Vietnam War, explores themes of camaraderie, trauma, and what it means to come home from war. The all-star cast, including Christopher Walken and Robert De Niro, brings depth and nuance to this powerful story.

If you're looking for something a bit more contemporary, I'd recommend "The Perks of Being a Wallflower". This coming-of-age tale also explores the complexities of growing up and finding one's place in the world. With its relatable characters and poignant portrayal of mental health, it might resonate with you.
